text: MouseCraft is an adventure indie 3D video game, developed and published by Poland-based game studio Crunching Koalas, for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, PlayStation Vita and Nintendo Switch. ==Plot== MouseCraft has 80 levels. Players can create their own maps with a Level Editor. ==References== ==External links== *Official website * Category:2014 video games Category:Adventure games Category:Indie video games Category:Windows games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Ouya games
title: MouseCraft
